entity.name: Mike DeWine
entity.description: Candidate for Ohio Governor Mike DeWine

text: @JRubinBlogger OH Dem here. I’m grateful Gov. DeWine has listened to science and Dr. Acton. They’ve done a wonderful job on the coronavirus response. However, I’m not a one issue voter. I don’t agree with Gov. DeWine on anything else and if he were on the ballot in Nov, I wouldn’t vote for him.
